title: Admin VA
job_overview:
Job Description:

We are looking for a highly organized and detail-oriented Admin Virtual Assistant to support our team of Occupational Therapists. The ideal candidate will have a solid understanding of the NDIS (National Disability Insurance Scheme) and prior experience working within the Australian healthcare system or in a similar therapeutic environment.

Key Responsibilities:
Provide administrative support to the Occupational Therapist team

Manage client records and documentation in compliance with NDIS standards

Assist with appointment scheduling, calendar management, and follow-ups

Coordinate communication between clients, therapists, and stakeholders

Prepare and manage reports, forms, and service agreements

Maintain confidentiality and accuracy in handling sensitive client information

Perform other administrative duties as needed to support daily operations

Qualifications:
Proven experience as a Virtual Assistant or Admin Support in a healthcare or NDIS setting

Strong knowledge of the Australian healthcare system and NDIS processes

Excellent communication and organizational skills

Familiarity with occupational therapy services is an advantage

Proficient in using digital tools and platforms (e.g., Google Workspace, CRM systems)
